Call for Contributions (Non-archival)

We welcome 1–2 page extended abstracts on topics connecting Information Theory and Generative AI.

  • Format: 1–2 pages (PDF)
  • Review: peer review
  • Presentation: contributed oral and/or poster presentations

(When you’re ready, send me the exact wording + deadlines you want on the site, and I’ll lock it in.)
